app.layout.title: Davy & Vivian
components.rsvp-email-check.errors.inval: The email address should be formatted like username@domain.com.
components.rsvp-email-check.errors.missi: Please fill in your email address.
components.rsvp-email-check.errors.not-i: Your email was not found on the guest list. Let the host know.
